languages.text: "Мы с самого начала не желали лить кровь на этой земле. Но твой спутник решил иначе — сбил наши корабли, загнал выживших в леса, выслеживал, жестоко истреблял..." {n}Глаза эльдара блестят на солнце.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Мы с самого начала не желали лить кровь на этой земле. Но твой спутник решил иначе — сбил наши корабли, загнал выживших в леса, выслеживал, жестоко истреблял..." {n}Глаза эльдара блестят на солнце.{/n}

languages.text: "We were reluctant to shed blood on this land, to begin with. But your companion decided otherwise — he shot down our vessels, chased us into the woods, harried and hounded the survivors..." {n}The Aeldari's eyes gleam in the sunlight.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Мы с самого начала не желали лить кровь на этой земле. Но твой спутник решил иначе — сбил наши корабли, загнал выживших в леса, выслеживал, жестоко истреблял..." {n}Глаза эльдара блестят на солнце.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "We were reluctant to shed blood on the ground to begin with. But your companion decided otherwise — he shot down our vessels, chased us into the woods, harried and hounded the survivors..." {n}The Aeldari's eyes gleam in the sunlight.{/n}

"We were reluctant to shed blood on the ground to begin with. But your companion decided otherwise — he shot down our vessels, chased us into the woods, harried and hounded the survivors..." {n}The Aeldari's eyes gleam in the sunlight.{/n}

"We were reluctant to shed blood on this land, to begin with. But your companion decided otherwise — he shot down our vessels, chased us into the woods, harried and hounded the survivors..." {n}The Aeldari's eyes gleam in the sunlight.{/n}

"We were reluctant to shed blood on this land, to begin with. But your companion decided otherwise — he shot down our vessels, chased us into the woods, harried and hounded the survivors..." {n}The Aeldari's eyes gleam in the sunlight.{/n}

languages.text: «Nosotros no teníamos ninguna intención de derramar sangre en esta tierra. Pero aquí tu compañero decidió lo contrario: derribó nuestras naves, nos persiguió por el bosque, hostigó y cazó a los supervivientes...». {n}La luz del sol se refleja en los ojos del Aeldari.{/n}
languages.original_text: "We were reluctant to shed blood on this land, to begin with. But your companion decided otherwise — he shot down our vessels, chased us into the woods, harried and hounded the survivors..." {n}The Aeldari's eyes gleam in the sunlight.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Nosotros no teníamos ninguna intención de derramar sangre. Pero aquí tu compañero decidió lo contrario: derribó nuestras naves, nos persiguió por el bosque, hostigó y cazó a los supervivientes...». {n}La luz del sol se refleja en los ojos del Aeldari.{/n}

languages.text: “我们一开始并不打算让任何人流血，可你的同伴却不这么想。他击坠了我们的舰船，把我们赶到森林里，还追捕幸存者……”{n}艾达灵族的双眼在阳光下闪闪发光。{/n}
languages.original_text: "We were reluctant to shed blood on this land, to begin with. But your companion decided otherwise — he shot down our vessels, chased us into the woods, harried and hounded the survivors..." {n}The Aeldari's eyes gleam in the sunlight.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我们一开始并不打算让任何人流血，可你的同伴却不这么想。他击坠了我们的舰船，把我们赶到森林里，还追捕幸存者……”{n}艾达灵族的双眼在阳光下闪闪发光。{/n}

languages.text: « Au départ, nous étions réticents à verser le sang sur ces terres, mais votre compagnon en a décidé autrement : il a abattu nos vaisseaux, nous a pourchassés dans les bois et a traqué les survivants. » {n}Les yeux de l'Aeldari brillent à la lumière du soleil.{/n}
languages.original_text: "We were reluctant to shed blood on this land, to begin with. But your companion decided otherwise — he shot down our vessels, chased us into the woods, harried and hounded the survivors..." {n}The Aeldari's eyes gleam in the sunlight.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Au départ, nous étions réticents à verser le sang, mais votre compagnon en a décidé autrement : il a abattu nos vaisseaux, nous a pourchassés dans les bois et a traqué les survivants. » {n}Les yeux de l'Aeldari brillent à la lumière du soleil.{/n}

languages.text: 「そもそも、我々は地上で血を流すことに抵抗があった。だが、お前の仲間は、そうしないことを選んだ…我々の船を撃墜し、森の中に私たちを追いやり、生存者を迫害し、追い回したのだ…」{n}アエルダリの目が太陽の光を受けて輝く。{/n}
languages.original_text: "We were reluctant to shed blood on this land, to begin with. But your companion decided otherwise — he shot down our vessels, chased us into the woods, harried and hounded the survivors..." {n}The Aeldari's eyes gleam in the sunlight.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「そもそも、我々は地上で血を流すことに抵抗があった。だが、お前の仲間は、そうしないことを選んだ…我々の船を撃墜し、森の中に私たちを追いやり、生存者を迫害し、追い回したのだ…」{n}アエルダリの目が太陽の光を受けて輝く。{/n}

languages.text: "Anfangs haben wir gezögert, Blut auf diesen Boden zu vergießen. Doch Euer Gefährte hat anders entschieden. Er hat unsere Schiffe abgeschossen, hat uns in die Wälder gejagt, eine Treibjagd auf die Überlebenden veranstaltet ..." {n}Die Augen des Aeldari funkeln im Sonnenlicht.{/n}
languages.original_text: "We were reluctant to shed blood on this land, to begin with. But your companion decided otherwise — he shot down our vessels, chased us into the woods, harried and hounded the survivors..." {n}The Aeldari's eyes gleam in the sunlight.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Anfangs haben wir gezögert, Blut zu vergießen. Doch Euer Gefährte hat anders entschieden. Er hat unsere Schiffe abgeschossen, hat uns in die Wälder gejagt, eine Treibjagd auf die Überlebenden veranstaltet ..." {n}Die Augen des Aeldari funkeln im Sonnenlicht.{/n}

languages.text: "İlk başta bu topraklarda kan dökmeye niyetimiz yoktu. Ancak yoldaşın aksinde karar kıldı. Gemilerimizi vurdu, ormanda peşimize düştü, hayatta kalanlara hem bela hem musallat oldu." {n}Aeldari'nin gözleri, gün ışığında parıldıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "We were reluctant to shed blood on this land, to begin with. But your companion decided otherwise — he shot down our vessels, chased us into the woods, harried and hounded the survivors..." {n}The Aeldari's eyes gleam in the sunlight.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "İlk başta bu topraklarda kan dökmeye niyetimiz yoktu. Ancak yoldaşın aksinde karar kıldı. Gemilerimizi vurdu, ormanda peşimize düştü, hayatta kalanlara hem bela hem musallat oldu." {n}Aeldari'nin gözleri, gün ışığında parıldıyor.{/n}
